html2img.custom_css: p{text-align: center; font-family: Arial} table {font-family: Arial; width: 100%; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0 5px; border: none}thead th {background-color: #006DCC; color: white; border: none; padding: 5px}tbody td {background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 5px; border: none; text-align: center}tr td:first-child,tr th:first-child {border-top-left-radius: 6px;border-bottom-left-radius: 6px;}tr td:last-child,tr th:last-child {border-top-right-radius: 6px;border-bottom-right-radius: 6px;}
